mapper.select: SELECT es.source_id, name, type, location, status, compliance_year, emissions_required, emission_date as latestEmissionDate, co2_emissions as latestCO2Emissions from emission_sources es join compliance_records cr on es.source_id = cr.source_id join emission_data ed on es.source_id = ed.source_id
select compliance_year, emissions_required from compliance_records where source_id = 1
select distinct project_name as name, expected_emissions_reduction as value from reduction_projects
select co2_emissions from emission_data ed join emission_sources es on ed.source_id = es.source_id where name = #{name} order by ed.emission_date

select price from transactions where year(transaction_date) = 2020 order by(transaction_type)
